docs.lead_paragraph: An innovative practice hopes its patient-centered methods will work on a national scale, allowing it to expand without losing effectiveness.

headline.main: Company Thinks It Has Answer for Lower Health Costs: Customer Service

docs.abstract: The Upshot; Iona Healthcare is placing large wager on innovative, patient-centered practices it hopes will return dividends by avoiding expensive care later; organization presents itself as solution to systemic inefficiency that has resulted in Americans suffering and dying earlier than those in other advanced nations while paying more for healthcare; is betting its innovations will be replicable, and financially rewarding, on national scale.
docs.snippet: An innovative practice hopes its patient-centered methods will work on a national scale, allowing it to expand without losing effectiveness.
